Miło Cię widzieć

Więcej o nas

Oferta

Mamy ponad 25 lat doświadczenia w branży. Poniżej główne dziedziny naszej pracy.

Sprzęt

Mikrokontrolery, komputery jednopłytkowe i przemysłowe.

Programowanie

Klasyczne, embedded, backend, bazy danych.

Elektronika

Projektowanie, budowa i naprawa.

Prototypowanie

Modele, wydruki, symulacje, testy.

Robotyka

Roboty przemysłowe, systemy wizyjne.

PlayableElectronics

Nasza pasja: instrumenty i kontrolery dla muzyków.

Portfolio

Zapraszamy do zapoznania się z naszym portfolio

Custom smart cameras

Our 5MP ARM based smart camera with ethernet interface and light control. Programmed in MicroPython. Capable of direct socket communication with Fanuc (and other) robots.

Quality control using Machine Learning

Touch panel based on Raspberry Pi CM4, used for object detection and validation with special trained model, in real time. Camera streams image to panel and display validation results. If detected object is incorrect, panel displays alert with confirmation.

Vision system for cardboard folding robot

ARM CPU board with linux, working with Basler camera and live preview with web interface. Program calculate cardboard position in 3D space and distance which can be measured with very high precision (1mm on entire stack's height). All working with red light and communicating with 6-axis Fanuc robot.

Vision system for riveting machine

Product placement in riveting machine using our smart camera. Very high precision (0.01 mm). Additional quality check and fast response time. STM-32 Camera with MicroPython on board. Works with Fanuc Robot using socket messaging communication. The camera also has a connector to power light with 24V which can be controlled using our board. Everything is enclosed in metal case with lens mount.

Metalwit OEE/WMS

OEE data collection and WMS

System3000

Recovery of debts / sales of debts - Web portal

KUNA

Webtool built to speed up an ease the usage of IFS ERP in repairs business. High traffic used by 600+ people.

Horus CRM v2

Complex CRM and related tools for polish 3M reseller.

Custom smart cameras

  • Rok: 2022
  • Klient: Metalwit Robots Lab

Metalwit OEE/WMS

OEE data collection and WMS

Category: Webapp
Customer: Metalwit
Backend: Django/Python
Frontend: W2UI
Database: Postres
More: Data collection from CNC machines, custom touch panels and dashboards. Custom linux nodes and network.

  • Date: Jan 2019 - Dec 2021

System3000

Recovery of debts / sales of debts - Web portal

Category: Webapp
Customer: System3000
Backend: Django/Python
Frontend: Bootstrap
Database: Postres
More: Complex logic/Document generation/Payments/Notifications/APIs

  • Date: Feb 2018 - Oct 2018

KUNA

Webtool built to speed up an ease the usage of IFS ERP in repairs business. High traffic used by 600+ people.

Category: High Traffic/Data Collection
Customer: Teleplan International
Backend: Django/Python/REST
Frontend: W2UI
Database: ORACLE/IFS
More: Linux scripting/Load Balancing/REDIS/Image processing/Other

  • Date: Jan 2017 - Present

Horus CRM v2

Complex CRM and related tools for polish 3M reseller.

Complex CRM and related tools for polish 3M reseller.
Category: CRM
Customer: Horus
Backend: Django/Python/REST
Frontend: W2UI
Database: MYSQL
More: Linux scripting

  • Date: Jan 2016 - Dec 2021

O nas

kawałek historii

Wszysko zaczęło się od Basic-a na Commodore 64 :) …a tak bardziej na poważnie to około 2001 roku, kiedy to Daniel Górny zaczął swoją profesjonalną przygodę z programowaniem. Wtedy były to głównie bazy danych MSSQL i MSAccess. Visual basic i inne tego typu technologie.
